meanings.sent1: The hobbledehoys struggled to carry the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: The hobbledehoys tripped over their own feet while playing soccer.
meanings.sent3: The hobbledehoys bumped into each other comically in the crowded hallway.
meanings.sent4: The hobbledehoys moved through the dance floor like uncoordinated marionettes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hobbledehoys falling over each other stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of awkward or clumsy individuals
meanings.sent1: The classroom was filled with hobbledehoys who couldn't sit still.
meanings.sent2: The hobbledehoys at the party kept knocking things over.
meanings.sent3: The hobbledehoys formed a human pyramid that collapsed in laughter.
meanings.sent4: The hobbledehoys in the play stumbled around the stage like lost puppies.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the hobbledehoys trying to dance together was both funny and endearing.
